name: Mementotlan Akihiron
desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can activate this effect; Level 9 or higher "Memento" monsters can attack directly this turn. If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can target 1 other "Memento" card in your GY or banishment; add it to your hand. If a "Memento" monster(s) in your hand and/or face-up field is destroyed by battle or card effect, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Mementotlan Akihiron" once per turn.
